埨字的基本解释

埨
lǔn
垄，在耕地上培成的一行一行的土埂，在上面种植农作物：“移栽之法，锄地分埨，使无积水，于埨背分行栽之。”

埨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǔn］
［《集韻》縷尹切，上準，來。］
(1)田中土垄。
(2)用于人名。《明史·诸王传四》徽庄王朱见沛之子名载埨。
[②]［lùn］
［《集韻》盧困切，去，來。］
同“陯1”。

埨字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页230第33
【集韻】縷尹切，淪上聲。壟土也。　又盧困切，音論。坎陷也。

埨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
埨字的起名意思

暂无。

Pi
Basic explanation of words
Pi
lǔn
Ridges, rows of soil ridges cultivated on the cultivated land, on which crops are planted: "The method of transplanting is to hoe the land and divide the ridges so that there is no stagnant water, and plant them on the back of the ridges."
Pi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǔn］
["Jiyun" Thread Yin cut, go ahead, come. ]
(1) Tianzhong soil ridge.
(2) Used for names. "The History of the Ming Dynasty · The Fourth Biography of the Kings" The son of Zhu Jianpei, the king of Huizhuang, was named Zai.
[②]［lùn］
["Jiyun" Lu Kunqie, go, come. ]
Same as "陯1".
Pi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　埨; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 230 33
[Ji Yun] Yin cuts into a thread, and becomes a voice. The ridged soil is also.　 Lu Kunqie again, on sound. The trap is also.
